abstract: Oleg V. Deripaska, the chief executive of the big aluminum producer Rusal, said on Tuesday that his company’s 25 percent stake in Norilsk Nickel was not for sale and denied reports that the Russian government was trying to push him to sell it to resolve a dispute with a fellow Russian billionaire.
snippet: Oleg V. Deripaska, the chief executive of the big aluminum producer Rusal, said on Tuesday that his company’s 25 percent stake in Norilsk Nickel was not for sale and denied reports that the Russian government was trying to push him to sell it to r...
lead_paragraph: Oleg V. Deripaska, the chief executive of the big aluminum producer Rusal, said on Tuesday that his company’s 25 percent stake in Norilsk Nickel was not for sale and denied reports that the Russian government was trying to push him to sell it to resolve a dispute with a fellow Russian billionaire.

headline.main: Russian Billionaire Stands Firm on Norilsk Nickel
